SEARCH
Package com.example.summit.utils

Class QRCodeGenerator

java.lang.Object
com.example.summit.utils.QRCodeGenerator
public class QRCodeGenerator extends Object
Utility class for generating QR codes for events. This class provides methods to create QR code bitmaps that can be displayed or saved for event identification and scanning purposes. Integrates with the Event and QrCode model classes to provide seamless QR code generation for the Summit event management system.
Since:
2025-11-04

  • Method Details

    • generateQRCodeForEvent

      public static Bitmap generateQRCodeForEvent(Event event)
      Generates a QR code for an Event object. Uses the event's ID to create the QR code with default dimensions.
      Parameters:
      event - The Event object to generate a QR code for
      Returns:
      A Bitmap containing the QR code image, or null if generation fails
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if event is null or event ID is null/empty

    • generateQRCodeFromQrCode

      public static Bitmap generateQRCodeFromQrCode(QrCode qrCode)
      Generates a QR code for a QrCode object. Uses the QrCode's encoded data (URL if available, otherwise event ID).
      Parameters:
      qrCode - The QrCode object to generate a bitmap for
      Returns:
      A Bitmap containing the QR code image, or null if generation fails
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if qrCode is null or has no encoded data

    • generateQRCode

      public static Bitmap generateQRCode(String eventId)
      Generates a QR code bitmap from the given event ID with default dimensions.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The unique identifier for the event to encode in the QR code
      Returns:
      A Bitmap containing the QR code image, or null if generation fails
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if eventId is null or empty

    • generateQRCode

      public static Bitmap generateQRCode(String eventId, int width, int height)
      Generates a QR code bitmap from the given event ID with custom dimensions. The QR code will encode the event ID which can later be scanned to retrieve event details.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The unique identifier for the event to encode in the QR code
      width - The desired width of the QR code image in pixels
      height - The desired height of the QR code image in pixels
      Returns:
      A Bitmap containing the QR code image, or null if generation fails
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if eventId is null or empty, or if width/height are invalid

    • generateQRCodeWithUrl

      public static Bitmap generateQRCodeWithUrl(String eventId, String baseUrl)
      Generates a QR code bitmap that encodes a URL to the event details. This is useful for creating scannable codes that directly link to event information.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The unique identifier for the event
      baseUrl - The base URL of your application (e.g., "https://summit.app/event/")
      Returns:
      A Bitmap containing the QR code image with the full URL, or null if generation fails
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if eventId or baseUrl is null or empty

    • generateColoredQRCode

      public static Bitmap generateColoredQRCode(String eventId, int width, int height, int foregroundColor, int backgroundColor)
      Generates a QR code with custom colors instead of the default black and white.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The unique identifier for the event to encode in the QR code
      width - The desired width of the QR code image in pixels
      height - The desired height of the QR code image in pixels
      foregroundColor - The color for the QR code pattern (default is black)
      backgroundColor - The color for the QR code background (default is white)
      Returns:
      A Bitmap containing the colored QR code image, or null if generation fails
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if eventId is null or empty, or if width/height are invalid

    • bitmapToBase64

      public static String bitmapToBase64(Bitmap bitmap)
      Converts a Bitmap to a Base64 encoded string for storage in Firebase. This allows the QR code image to be stored in the database.
      Parameters:
      bitmap - The Bitmap to convert
      Returns:
      A Base64 encoded string representing the bitmap, or null if conversion fails

    • base64ToBitmap

      public static Bitmap base64ToBitmap(String base64String)
      Converts a Base64 encoded string back to a Bitmap. This is used to retrieve QR code images from Firebase.
      Parameters:
      base64String - The Base64 encoded string to convert
      Returns:
      A Bitmap object, or null if conversion fails

    • createQrCodeObjectForEvent

      public static QrCode createQrCodeObjectForEvent(Event event)
      Creates a complete QrCode object with generated bitmap data for an Event. This method generates the QR code, converts it to Base64, and populates a QrCode object ready to be saved to Firebase.
      Parameters:
      event - The Event to create a QR code for
      Returns:
      A QrCode object with all fields populated, or null if generation fails
